title: LTO tells pick-up truck driver to explain viral ‘full stop’ on expressway
desc: The Land Transportation Office (LTO) has issued a show cause order (SCO) against the driver of a black pick-up truck that suddenly stopped in the middle of an expressway, endangering other motorists on the road.

title: The US moved away from its heartland to set a Winter Olympics high in Italy
desc: Other nations are catching up with the US in its traditional strengths such as snowboarding. But that’s not necessarily a bad thing for Americans

title: My rookie era: I wasn’t immediately good at oil painting, but it taught me to find pleasure in struggle
desc: One week I spent three miserable hours trying to paint a satin ribbon, and went home in a filthy mood

title: ‘This girl was braver than I was’: Julia Kochetova’s astonishing photographs of war in Ukraine
desc: From children’s funerals to underground shelters to the frontline, Kochetova has captured the conflict with power and humanity for the Guardian. ‘I have the same scars as the people I photograph,’ she says ahead of a major show

title: Nick Reiner pleads not guilty to murder in the killing of his parents
desc: Nick Reiner pleaded not guilty Monday to two counts of first-degree murder in the killing of his parents, Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner.

title: Iran to submit draft agreement to US ahead Geneva talks
desc: US officials expect Tehran to present a comprehensive proposal rather than a document outlining general principles.

title: Samsung Galaxy Book6 Series US pricing and pre-order date revealed
desc: Samsung Galaxy Book6 Series US pricing and pre-order date are now officially out prior to company's upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event.

title: Tom Hanks to Play Abraham Lincoln in 'Lincoln In The Bardo' Movie
desc: Tom Hanks is set to star in and produce a film adaptation of "Lincoln in The Bardo." The Oscar winner will portray President Abraham Lincoln.

title: Xavier Trudeau reveals what he thinks of dad Justin Trudeau’s girlfriend Katy Perry
desc: Musician and son of Justin Trudeau, Xav, recently talked about meeting his dad’s new girlfriend in a social media video.
